rows.name: Veronica
rows.description: Madrid, 1990s. After making a Ouija with friends, a teenager is besieged by dangerous supernatural presences that threaten to harm her whole family. Inspired by terrifying police files never solved.
rows.actors: Sandra Escacena, Bruna González, Claudia Placer, Iván Chavero
rows.studio: Apaches Entertainment

rows.name: Professor Marston and the Wonder Women
rows.name_orig: Professor Marston and the Wonder Women
rows.description: The unconventional life of Dr. William Marston, the Harvard psychologist and inventor who helped invent the modern lie detector test and created Wonder Woman in 1941.
rows.actors: Luke Evans, Rebecca Hall, Bella Heathcote, Connie Britton
rows.studio: Topple Productions, Boxspring Entertainment, Opposite Field

rows.name: Please Stand By
rows.description: A young autistic woman runs away from her caregiver in order to boldly go and deliver her 500-page Star Trek script to a writing competition in Hollywood. On an adventure full of laughter and tears, Wendy follows the guiding spirit of Mr. Spock on her journey into the unknown.
rows.actors: Dakota Fanning, Toni Collette, Alice Eve, River Alexander
rows.studio: 2929 Productions, Allegiance Theater

rows.name: Phantom Thread
rows.description: Renowned British dressmaker Reynolds Woodcock comes across Alma, a young, strong-willed woman, who soon becomes a fixture in his life as his muse and lover.
rows.actors: Daniel Day-Lewis, Vicky Krieps, Lesley Manville, Camilla Rutherford
rows.studio: Ghoulardi Film Company, Focus Features, Annapurna Pictures,

rows.name: In the Fade
rows.description:
Katja's life c
    ollapses after a senseless act impacts her life. After a time of mourning and injustice, she seeks revenge.
rows.actors: Diane Kruger, Denis Moschitto, Numan Acar, Johannes Krisch
rows.studio: Bombero International, Macassar Productions, Corazón Interna

rows.name: Disobedience
rows.description: A woman learns about the death of her father. She returns to her Orthodox Jewish home and falls in love with her best childhood friend who is now married to her cousin.
rows.actors: Rachel Weisz, Rachel McAdams, Alessandro Nivola, Cara Horgan
rows.studio: Braven Films, Element Pictures, Film4 Productions, Universal

rows.name: To End All Wars
rows.description: Based on a real-life story, this drama focuses on a small group of Allied soldiers in Burma who are held captive by the Japanese. Capt. Ernest Gordon (Ciaran McMenamin), Lt. Jim Reardon (Kiefer Sutherland) and Maj. Ian Campbell (Robert Carlyle) are among the military officers kept imprisoned and routinely beaten and deprived of food. While Campbell wants to rebel and attempt an escape, Gordon tries to take a more stoic approach, an attitude that proves to be surprisingly resonant.
rows.actors: Ciarán McMenamin, Robert Carlyle, Kiefer Sutherland, Sakae Kimura
rows.studio: Argyll Film Partners, Gummshoe Productions, Integrity Partne

rows.name: Tully
rows.description: Marlo, a mother of three including a newborn, is gifted a night nanny by her brother. Hesitant to the extravagance at first, Marlo comes to form a bond with the thoughtful, surprising, and sometimes challenging nanny named Tully.
rows.actors: Charlize Theron, Mackenzie Davis, Mark Duplass, Ron Livingston
rows.studio: Bron Studios, Denver and Delilah Productions, Right of Way F

rows.name: Fallen
rows.description:
Homicide detective John Hobbes witnesses the execution of serial killer Edgar Reese. Soon after the execution the killings start again, and they are very simila
    r to Reese's style.
rows.actors: Denzel Washington, John Goodman, Donald Sutherland, Embeth Davidtz
rows.studio: Turner Pictures (I), Atlas Entertainment

rows.name: The Exception
rows.description: A German soldier tries to determine if the Dutch resistance has planted a spy to infiltrate the home of Kaiser Wilhelm in Holland during the onset of World War II, but falls for a young Jewish Dutch woman during his investigation.
rows.actors: Lily James, Jai Courtney, Eddie Marsan, Christopher Plummer
rows.studio: Egoli Tossell Film, Egoli Tossell KLK, Alton Road Production

rows.name: Man on Fire
rows.description: Jaded ex-CIA operative John Creasy reluctantly accepts a job as the bodyguard for a 10-year-old girl in Mexico City. They clash at first, but eventually bond, and when she's kidnapped he's consumed by fury and will stop at nothing to save her life.
rows.actors: Denzel Washington, Dakota Fanning, Radha Mitchell, Christopher Walken
rows.studio: Epsilon Motion Pictures, Fox 2000 Pictures, Regency Enterpri

rows.name: House of Sand and Fog
rows.description: Behrani, an Iranian immigrant buys a California bungalow, thinking he can fix it up, sell it again, and make enough money to send his son to college. However, the house is the legal property of former drug addict Kathy. After losing the house in an unfair legal dispute with the county, she is left with nowhere to go. Wanting her house back, she hires a lawyer and befriends a police officer. Neither Kathy nor Behrani have broken the law, so they find themselves involved in a difficult moral dilemma.
rows.actors: Jennifer Connelly, Ben Kingsley, Ron Eldard, Frances Fisher
rows.studio: Bisgrove Entertainment, Cobalt Media Group, DreamWorks

rows.name: Wildling
rows.description: A young woman held in captivity discovers the realities of truth and lies in the outside world.
rows.actors: Bel Powley, Liv Tyler, Collin Kelly-Sordelet, Brad Dourif
rows.studio: Maven Pictures, Film i Väst, Filmgate Films, ARRI Media Prod

rows.name: Dark Crimes
rows.description: A hard-boiled detective becomes suspicious of an author when the incidents described in his hit novel resemble the inner-workings of an unsolved murder.
rows.actors: Jim Carrey, Charlotte Gainsbourg, Marton Csokas, Kati Outinen
rows.studio: RatPac-Dune Entertainment, Gerson Film, InterTitle Films, Op

rows.name: The Third Murder
rows.description: Shigemori is a lawyer tasked with defending Misumi in a murder trial. Misumi has previous convictions for murder and has confessed to the crime, but evidence in the case leads to Shigemori having doubts about what really happened.
rows.actors: Masaharu Fukuyama, Koji Yakusho, Shinnosuke Mitsushima, Mikako Ichikawa
rows.studio: Gaga Corporation, Fuji Television Network, Amuse, Fuji IG La

rows.name: How to Get Away with Murder Season 1-4
rows.name_orig: How to Get Away with Murder
rows.description: A sexy, suspense-driven legal thriller about a group of ambitious law students and their brilliant, mysterious criminal defense professor. They become entangled in a murder plot and will shake the entire university and change the course of their lives.
rows.actors: Viola Davis, Alfie Enoch, Jack Falahee, Aja Naomi King
rows.studio: ABC Studios, ShondaLand

rows.name: Behind Enemy Lines
rows.description: While flying a routine reconnaissance mission over Bosnia, fighter pilot Chris Burnett photographs something he wasn't supposed to see and gets shot down behind enemy lines, where he must outrun an army led by a ruthless Serbian general. With time running out and a deadly tracker on his trail, Burnett's commanding officer decides to risk his career and launch a renegade rescue mission to save his life.
rows.actors: Owen Wilson, Gene Hackman, Gabriel Macht, Charles Malik Whitfield
rows.studio: Davis Entertainment, 20th Century Fox

rows.name: Mary Magdalene
rows.description: Set in the Holy Land in the first century C.E., a young woman leaves her small fishing village and traditional family behind to join a radical new social movement. At its head is a charismatic leader, Jesus of Nazareth, who promises that the world is changing. Mary is searching for a new way of living, and an authenticity that is denied her by the rigid hierarchies of the day. As the notoriety of the group spread and more are drawn to follow Jesus’ inspirational message, Mary’s spiritual journey places her at the heart of a story that will lead to the capital city of Jerusalem, where she must confront the reality of Jesus’ destiny and her own place within it.
rows.actors: Rooney Mara, Joaquin Phoenix, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Ariane Labed
rows.studio: See-Saw Films, Porchlight Films, Universal Pictures Internat

rows.name: Women of Mafia
rows.description: A former police officer goes under cover in the mafia.
rows.actors: Olga Bołądź, Aleksandra Popławska, Kasia Warnke, Julia Wieniawa-Narkiewicz
rows.studio: Vega Investments

rows.name: 12 Monkeys Season 1,2
rows.description: Inspired by the classic film, 12 Monkeys explores the provocative story of a time traveler from a decimated future in a high-stakes race against the clock. Utilizing a dangerous and untested method of time travel, he journeys from 2043 to the present day on a mission to locate and eradicate the source of a deadly plague that will all but annihilate the human race. The series is produced by Universal Cable Productions in association with Atlas Entertainment, producer of the original theatrical film. 12 Monkeys stars Aaron Stanford (as time-traveler Cole), Amanda Schull (Dr. Cassandra Railly), Kirk Acevedo (Ramse), Barbara Sukowa (Jones) and Noah Bean (Aaron Marker). Additional key recurring roles include Tom Noonan (Damages, Hell on Wheels) as a mysterious villain, and Emily Hampshire (Rookie Blue) as mental patient Jennifer Goines.
rows.director: Дэвид Гроссман, Майкл Ваксман, Джон Бэдэм
rows.\n actors: Bruce Willis, Madeleine Stowe, Brad Pitt, Christopher Plummer
rows.studio: Sci-Fi & Fantasy
